summary: Completed comprehensive testing of NEW features added to DiffBond Analyzer. All 3 new backend endpoints and 5 new frontend features are working correctly.

minor_bugs.issue: Test validation considers UTS values 49-118 MPa 'unreasonable' but these are actually valid for MA2-1/VT1-0 materials
minor_bugs.impact: Test validation issue only, functionality works correctly

passed_tests: NEW: MA2-1 material has category 'both' (changed from 'plate')
NEW: POST /api/parametric endpoint returns parametric study data with 5 data points
NEW: Parametric API returns all required properties (uts for 5 models, yield, elongation_pct, grain_size_um, hardness_hv, bend_angle_deg)
NEW: POST /api/calculate returns additional_properties field with all 4 required properties
NEW: POST /api/export/stress-figure returns PNG image successfully
NEW: Frontend Parametric Study section visible on calculator page
NEW: Parametric parameter selector has 8 options and updates min/max values correctly
NEW: Parametric Generate button triggers study and produces results
NEW: Parametric study generates 6 charts grid (UTS all models, Yield, Elongation, Grain Size, Hardness, Bend Angle)
NEW: Stress distribution chart displays figure caption with scientific format starting with 'Fig. 1.'
NEW: Save as Figure button is present, enabled, and functional
All existing backend APIs still working (materials CRUD, calculations, exports)
All existing frontend functionality preserved (calculator, model results, charts)
Backend health check API working
Materials API returns 10 materials (increased from 9)
Calculation API returns 5 models and 241-point stress distribution
Export APIs (PDF/CSV/Chart) all working correctly
Frontend loads successfully with proper dark theme
Calculator interface with MA2-1 and VT1-0 pre-selected
Model results table shows all 5 calculation models with color-coded bars
Interface zone parameter sliders functional
Sandwich structure visualization displays correctly

success_percentage.backend: 96.3% (26/27 tests passed - 1 test validation issue only)
success_percentage.frontend: 100% (all UI components and new integrations working)
